description: Sets the migration state of an application. For a given application identified by the value passed to ApplicationId, its status is set or updated by passing one of three values to Status: NOT_STARTED | IN_PROGRESS | COMPLETED.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The configurationId in Application Discovery Service that uniquely identifies the grouped application.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Status of the application - Not Started, In-Progress, Complete.
